content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw;
GO

/*
SELECT 
        td.year
       ,td.month
       ,tz.borough
       ,CONVERT(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime) AS trip_date
      ,cal.day_name  AS trip_day
      ,iif(cal.day_name IN ('Saturday','Sunday'),'Y','N') AS trip_day_weekend_ind
      ,SUM(iif(pt.description = 'Credit card',1,0)) AS card_trip_count
      ,SUM(iif(pt.description = 'Cash',1,0)) AS cash_trip_count
FROM silver.vw_trip_data_green td
INNER JOIN silver.taxi_zone tz ON (td.pu_location_id = tz.loation_id)
INNER JOIN silver.calendar cal ON (cal.date = CONVERT(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime))
INNER JOIN silver.payment_type pt ON (td.payment_type = pt.payment_type)

WHERE td.year = '2020'
  AND td.month = '01'

GROUP BY td.year
        ,td.month
        ,tz.borough
        ,CONVERT(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime) 
       ,cal.day_name 

*/

EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2020' , @month = '01'
EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2020' , @month = '02'
EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2020' , @month = '03'
EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2020' , @month = '04'
EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2020' , @month = '05'
EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2020' , @month = '06'
EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2020' , @month = '07'
EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2020' , @month = '08'
EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2020' , @month = '09'
EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2020' , @month = '10'
EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2020' , @month = '11'
EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2020' , @month = '12'

EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2021' , @month = '01'
EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2021' , @month = '02'
EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2021' , @month = '03'
EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2021' , @month = '04'
EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2021' , @month = '05'
EXEC gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green @year = '2021' , @month = '06'


/*

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT 
        td.year
       ,td.month
       ,tz.borough
       ,CONVERT(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime) AS trip_date
      ,cal.day_name  AS trip_day
      ,iif(cal.day_name IN (''Saturday'',''Sunday''),''Y'',''N'') AS trip_day_weekend_ind
      ,SUM(iif(pt.description = ''Credit card'',1,0)) AS card_trip_count
      ,SUM(iif(pt.description = ''Cash'',1,0)) AS cash_trip_count
FROM silver.vw_trip_data_green td
INNER JOIN silver.taxi_zone tz ON (td.pu_location_id = tz.loation_id)
INNER JOIN silver.calendar cal ON (cal.date = CONVERT(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime))
INNER JOIN silver.payment_type pt ON (td.payment_type = pt.payment_type)

WHERE td.year = ''2020''
  AND td.month = ''01''

GROUP BY td.year
        ,td.month
        ,tz.borough
        ,CONVERT(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime) 
       ,cal.day_name'

*/
